text.title: Former Indian president APJ Abdul Kalam dies at age 83
text.head: Former Indian president APJ Abdul Kalam dies at age 83
Sources

list.item: Rahul Karmakar and Rezaul H Laskar. "'Missile Man': Ex-president APJ Abdul Kalam passes away" — Hindustan Times , July 28, 2015
. "End of an era: 'Missile man' APJ Abdul Kalam passes away after cardiac arrest in Shillong" — Firstpost , July 28, 2015
